mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO BD_T_ENTE_INFO (ENTERPRISE_ID,CH_NAME,EN_NAME,REGISTER_NAME,LOGO,PHASE,INDUSTRY,SETUP_DT,ENTERPRISE_FORM,SUB_FORM,REL_TYPE,CONTACT,CONTACT_TEL,REL_COMPANY,CONTROLLER,CONTROLLER_TEL,BIZ_CARRIER,OPERATION,COMPANY_PROFILE,PROFILE_FILE,TAX_COLLECTION,TAX_DESC,IS_HN_TECH,APPR_DT,CERTIFICATE,OTHE_ENTE_TYPE,DIRECTOR_CNT,SUPERVISOR_CNT,STATUS,CREATE_BY,CREATE_DT,UPDATE_BY,UPDATE_DT,ORGN_CODE,MAIN_BUSINESS,GROUP_ID,PROJ_GUID,PATENT_COUNT,IS_PUBLIC_COMP,STOCK_CODE,STOCK_NAME,INDUSTRY2,SOCIAL_CODE)
( select #{item.enterpriseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.chName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.enName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.registerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.logo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.phase,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.industry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.setupDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.enterpriseForm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.subForm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.relType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.contactTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.relCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.controller,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.controllerTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.bizCarrier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.operation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.companyProfile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.profileFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.taxCollection,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.taxDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isHnTech,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.apprDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.certificate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.otheEnteType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.directorCnt,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.supervisorCnt,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.updateDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.orgnCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.mainBusiness,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.groupId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.projGuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.patentCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isPublicComp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.stockCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.stockName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.industry2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.socialCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} from dual)
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM BD_T_ENTE_INFO WHERE ENTERPRISE_ID IN
#{item}

PROFILE_FILE = #{profileFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

SUPERVISOR_CNT = #{supervisorCnt,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_DT = #{createDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_BY = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_DT = #{updateDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ORGN_CODE = #{orgnCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAIN_BUSINESS = #{mainBusiness,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GROUP_ID = #{groupId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
PROJ_GUID = #{projGuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PATENT_COUNT = #{patentCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_PUBLIC_COMP = #{isPublicComp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

IS_SUPERVISOR_CNT = #{isSupervisorCnt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

ENTE_ID = #{enteId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_REG = #{isReg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_ABROAD = #{isAbroad,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_APPLY_IPO = #{isApplyIpo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_NEW_BOARD = #{isNewBoard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_HLIGHTS = #{isHlights,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HLIGHTS_REMARK = #{hlightsRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

REG_AMOUNT_CURRENCY = #{regAmountCurrency,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE ENTERPRISE_ID = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.sql:
SELECT DISTINCT a.*, b.CUST_NAME, b.PHONE_NO, d.proj_id, d.proj_name, d.inve_id, d.inve_name, d.update_dt as upDt FROM tz_t_proj_info d inner join BD_T_ENTE_INFO a on d.OLD_ENTERPRISE_ID=a.ENTERPRISE_ID and d.status!='2' left join EI_T_CUST_MEMBER b on a.ENTERPRISE_ID=b.ORGN_ID and b.IS_MAIN_CONTACT='1' and b.status='0' and a.STATUS='0'
d.proj_type='1'
and (d.CREATE_BY=#{paramMap.userId} or d.CREATE_BY=#{paramMap.loginName} or d.CREATE_BY in ( select z2.id from bd_t_fund_account_maping z1 inner join base.app_user z2 on z1.user_id=z2.loginname where z1.is_rep is null and (z1.create_by = #{paramMap.loginName} or z1.create_by =#{paramMap.userId} ))) /*and ( d.CREATE_BY=#{paramMap.userId} or ( d.inve_id in( select a.fund_id from bd_t_fund_info a inner join tz_t_proj_info b on b.proj_object=a.fund_id and b.proj_type='2' and a.status!='2' and b.status!='2' where a.OLD_SUB_PLAT_PROP in(4,6,5) and ( b.CREATE_BY=#{paramMap.loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or b.CREATE_BY=#{paramMap.userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or b.CREATE_BY in ( select TO_CHAR(z2.id)as id from bd_t_fund_account_maping z1 inner join base.app_user z2 on z1.user_id=z2.loginname where z1.is_rep is null and (z1.create_by = #{paramMap.loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}or z1.create_by =#{paramMap.userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) ) or a.FUND_ID in (select z2.OBJECT_ID from GF_T_DATA_APPLY z2 where z2.USER_ID =#{paramMap.loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and z2.APPLY_TYPE='2' and z2.STATUS = '2')) ) ) )*/
and d.inve_id in(select fund_id from bd_t_fund_info where OLD_SUB_PLAT_PROP in(2,4,6,5) and nvl(ISDIRECT,'0')<1 )
and (d.CREATE_BY=#{paramMap.userId} or d.CREATE_BY=#{paramMap.loginName})
order by d.update_dt desc
mapper.update:
